## concat variable

Returns the concatenation sequence of given nullable  or [ISeqable](./api.iseqable.md) values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
concat: <T>(...args: Nullable<ISeq<T> | ISeqable<T>>[]) => ISeq<T> | undefined
```
